message: If you'd like, I'll create a group and a script to demonstrate the bug
I have a bot listening to a group for new topics; when it sees one, it sends a message to the topic immediately
I don't see the message in the topic, though, until I refresh the page
@llimllib Thanks, I think I know what that might be.  There may be a slight race condition in the time between when a page renders and the javascript live updating stuff starts happening.
We have some stuff in place that should fix that, but maybe it's broken and we haven't noticed since it's subtle.  I'll file a ticket for myself now to look into it.
